aircraft.value: Hornet Strike - AC-7503-574 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Fire control computer error. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 06/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 07/12/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 07/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 10/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 11/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
